title: Alice Stood Up
description: Alice’s boyfriend doesn’t show up for their date, and her evening takes a turn for the worse.From the safety of a police station later that night, Alice tells her story to a Spectavi vampire interviewer.Alice Stood Up is a short story, approximately 4,000 words long, that supplements the Vampires and the Life of Erin Rose novels. Edited by Lynn O'Dell, Red Adept Publishing.
author: S.M. Perlow
